verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Hal-lu Praise יָ֨הּ׀ <S%H3050><s%> yah ye the LORD הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> hal-lu- Praise אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> 'el God בְּקָדְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H6944><s%> be-ka-de-Sho; in his sanctuary הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> hal-Lu-hu, praise בִּרְקִ֥יעַ <S%H7549><s%> bir-Ki-a' him in the firmament עֻזּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5797><s%> uz-Zo. of his power

הַֽלְל֥וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> hal-Lu-hu Praise בִגְבוּרֹתָ֑יו <S%H1369><s%> vig-vu-ro-Tav; him for his mighty acts הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> hal-Lu-hu, praise כְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> ke-Ro him according to his excellent גֻּדְלֽוֹ׃ <S%H1433><s%> gud-Lo. greatness

הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> Hal-lu-hu Praise בְּתֵ֣קַע <S%H8629><s%> be-Te-ka' him with the sound שׁוֹפָ֑ר <S%H7782><s%> sho-Far; of the trumpet הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> hal-Lu-hu, praise בְּנֵ֣בֶל <S%H5035><s%> be-Ne-vel him with the psaltery וְכִנּֽוֹר׃ <S%H3658><s%> ve-chin-Nor. and harp

הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> Hal-lu-hu Praise בְתֹ֣ף <S%H8596><s%> ve-Tof him with the timbrel וּמָח֑וֹל <S%H4234><s%> u-ma-Chol; and dance הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> hal-Lu-hu, praise בְּמִנִּ֥ים <S%H4482><s%> be-min-Nim him with stringed instruments וְעוּגָֽב׃ <S%H5748><s%> ve-'u-Gav. and organs

הַֽלְל֥וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> hal-Lu-hu Praise בְצִלְצְלֵי־ <S%H6767><s%> ve-tzil-tze-lei- cymbals שָׁ֑מַע <S%H8088><s%> Sha-ma'; him upon the loud הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> hal-Lu-hu, praise בְּֽצִלְצְלֵ֥י <S%H6767><s%> be-tzil-tze-Lei cymbals תְרוּעָֽה׃ <S%H8643><s%> te-ru-'Ah. him upon the high sounding

כֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> kol everything הַ֭נְּשָׁמָה <S%H5397><s%> Han-ne-sha-mah Let every thing that hath breath תְּהַלֵּ֥ל <S%H1984><s%> te-hal-Lel praise יָ֗הּ <S%H3050><s%> Yah, the LORD הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> hal-lu- Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> Yah. ye the LORD
